info.brief_description: A story about a genie or similar creature that grants wishes to his "masters"
info.description: Ok this is my first interactive story on here so please enjoy and add. Now ground rules you can make anything you want to but no killing unless approved by the characters creator and me, and even if it's your character you need my approval for death I don't want a bunch of senseless deaths. Next the wishes in your chapters can be twisted in anyway you want anything that does not violate the above no killing without permission rule is ok. Also please try and use decent spelling and grammar. I may not be the grammar police and I will go ahead and say mine isn't perfect but if no one can understand it no one can enjoy it. Next if you want to add images for your characters or environment I'm ok with that but please none of the creature I want everyone to be able to imagine their own version. That being said the creature can transform and disguise itself so if you use an image while it is disguised then that's ok. Also the creature can be any gender it wants so he she it or adjectives like that all are good. Now if you want to make the creature good or evil or somewhere in between is up to you. It's motivation isn't entirely known. Also please don't make people turn into like a tv character or something. I don't care how hot cool or iconic the character is I want people to create their own stuff now you can mention it in the background like maybe someone is watching a Star Wars movie and that's ok, but don't just turn your character into Asoka just cause you have a crush on her. Alright well that is the rules so unless anything changes I won't add anymore, but failure to follow the rules will force me to contact you via mail and if you still don't change it I will delete it. Thanks and review and if you have any questions comments or observations you know how to reach me.
